nodes.text: The Hutt Hideout was a cave on the planet Tatooine. It was used by thugs working for Jabba the Hutt. The cave was located east of the Mesric Plateau, and some distance southeast of Mos Taike.
Sometime following 0 BBY, Errik Darksider sold the coordinates to the hideout to a spacer interested in working for the Hutt.
